### Aliases:

* <a href="/api_docs/python/tf/image/resize_bilinear"><code>tf.compat.v1.image.resize_bilinear</code></a>


``` python
tf.image.resize_bilinear(
    images,
    size,
    align_corners=False,
    name=None,
    half_pixel_centers=False
```
